markdownRemark.html:
I’ve been considering how I want my app to look. I love the idea of a soft-edged but soft “blobby” looking style, but in a minimal way. I would like to enhance this style further with animation, so I gave a go at something using SVG filters and CSS.

Obviously, elements wouldn’t be dragged together but instead you can imagine items popping out of a button that all had this style.

One issue is I plan to make an app and I’m not sure how difficult or what technologies I would have available to me that would allow me to do something like this easily.
